article:
It was a cloudy Saturday afternoon.A group of birds were having a great time searching for food and playing on the main road.All of a sudden, a big truck sped through.A _ thing happened.Birds could _ , too.Although this bird had already _ , another bird flew over to her immediately, just like a family member, unable to accept the _ .
Not long after that, another car passed by quickly, _ the dead bird's body to whirl  with the wind.The male bird _ the movement.As if she was still alive, he _ flew beside her again.He stared at her as if he was asking, " _ are you not getting up?"
 _ , she was no longer able to hear him.At the same time, he was trying to lift her up.He, of course , was unable to bear the burden.Another car soon passed by.He quickly flew off .Once the car had gone, he came down again.
Although other birds told him that it was _ , he never gave up.He was trying his best to _ her up.Another car passed by, and her dead body whirled again as if she was still alive and trying to _ .He had used all of his energy, but he was too weak.
